title: Japan Atlas: A Bilingual Guide
description: Completely revised for its third edition, Japan A Bilingual Guide has been thoroughly updated using the latest satellite technology. The maps are now of the highest quality, and much more precise and detailed than in the past. The only atlas of its kind to provide place-names in bothEnglish and Japanese, the volume includes a total of sixty-eight maps that reflect all significant changes to Japan's infrastructure (roads, transit systems, buildings, etc.). Eight comprehensive maps feature notable tourist and resort areas, domestic airline routes, and thematic maps such asnatural parks, World Heritage sites, historic spots, pottery kiln areas, and more.
author: Atsushi Umeda
